parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to query the tenant ID.
